name: Visual Effects - Exhaustive
description: Extends the extended list with additional criteria for visual effects.
author: the-zinny team

criteria.name: Production Achievement
criteria.description: The improvement of support tools and processes, exceptional management of process, or groundbreaking scale of scope.

criteria.name: Overall Fidelity
criteria.description: The overall realism and believability of the VFX.

criteria.name: Worst Case Fidelity
criteria.description: A measure of consistency of fidelity across the body of work.

criteria.name: Supporting Role
criteria.description: The VFX supported or enhanced the process of acting, directing, or other film elements.

criteria.name: SFX (Overall)
criteria.description: IRL special effects, like explosions, pyrotechnics, and other practical effects.

criteria.name: CGI (Overall)
criteria.description: Creating animated sequences using computer-generated imagery (CGI).

criteria.name: Character Animation
criteria.description: Bringing digital characters to life through movement and expression.

criteria.name: Compositing
criteria.description: Combining multiple visual elements into a single image or sequence.

criteria.name: Simulation Effects
criteria.description: Creating realistic simulations of natural phenomena like water, fire, smoke, and explosions.

criteria.name: Stop Motion Animation
criteria.description: Creating animation by physically manipulating objects frame by frame.

criteria.name: Humanity Value
criteria.description: The moral or societal value of the film.

criteria.name: Miniatures
criteria.description: Using scale models to create realistic scenes.

criteria.name: Puppeteering
criteria.description: Using puppets for live-action or hybrid productions.

criteria.name: Makeup and Prosthetics
criteria.description: Applying physical makeup and prosthetics for character effects.

criteria.name: Pyrotechnics
criteria.description: Creating controlled explosions and fire effects.

criteria.name: Innovation
criteria.description: The use of new or experimental techniques.

criteria.name: Community Value
criteria.description: The VFX work furthers the craft and contributes to future efforts.
